    Monte Carlo Radiation transfer and adaptive/Cartesian grid codes

    Date: February 28, 2018

    Talk on how Monte Carlo radiation transfer (MCRT) can be applied to modelling the propagation of photons through various tissues. Talk covers brief basic introduction to MCRT and how various different grids can be used to track various quantities with in the simulation. Link to slides
